subject: Fines (Penalties)
Hockey, Ice
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: A Penguins co-owner and Hall of Famer does not think the N.H.L.’s punishments in the aftermath of the teams’ brawl-filled game were sufficient.
snippet: A Penguins co-owner and Hall of Famer does not think the N.H.L.’s punishments in the aftermath of the teams’ brawl-filled game were sufficient.
